ResourceHeader.ResourceName: HFR-60S STEREO-B 'DEF' High Frequency Receiver (125 - 16025 kHz) - Flux Density
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains definitive 1 min averaged flux density from the STEREO-B WAVES High Frequency Receiver (HFR) in the frequency range 125 - 16025 kHz.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Data provided are publicly available. If used in presentations or publications, please acknowledge STEREO/Waves Investigation (M. Maksimovic and S. D. Bale, PIs).
We recommend the data users to contact the STEREO/Waves team early in their study. For reporting purposes, we request bibliography information for any publication, etc., using these data. Please send information on the use of this data to: M. Maksimovic (PI).
We suggest to add the following lines into the acknowledgments: 
The authors acknowledge CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales), CNRS (Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique), and Observatoire de Paris for support to the STEREO/Waves team and the CDPP (Centre de Donn√©es de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of the STEREO/Waves data.
The following paper should also be used to reference: 
Bougeret et al, Space Science Reviews, 2008, doi:10.1007/s11214-007-9298-8

Parameter.Name: HFR-60S STEREO-B Averaged Spectral density  (over 60-second intervals)
Parameter.Description: HFR-60S  STEREO-B Flux  density  for the frequencies analyzed on C1 channel averaged over 60-second intervals
